testcase.classname: Validate the search functionality of NHS Jobs website
testcase.name: Validate the search functionality with preference job title
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the browser and load the nhs job url...............passed When User should enter the job title in the Job title text box..............passed And User should click the search button.....................................passed And User should get a list of jobs that matches preferences.................passed And User should sort the search results with newest date posted.............passed Then Job results should display with newest date posted.....................passed
